name: Above and Below, Team-Up
effect:
Play Above and Below only if you control an X-Men character and a Morlocks character.
Draw a card.
Storm fought to bring the Morlocks and the X-Men under one leader—not to gain power, but to save her friends.

name: Absolute Power
effect:
Play Absolute Power only if you control exactly one visible character.
Exhaust any number of hidden characters you control. Recover target stunned Hellfire Club character you control if its cost is less than or equal to the combined cost of the charac

name: Absorbing Man, Carl Creel
effect:
Whenever Absorbing Man stuns a character, put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on Absorbing Man.
Remove a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter from Absorbing Man >>> Gain 1 resource point. Spend this resource point only to pay the cost of a payment power. Use this power

name: Acolyte Body Armor
effect:
Equipped character gets +1 DEF and gets an additional +1 DEF while exhausted.
Discard Acolyte Body Armor >> Target Acolyte attacker you control gets +5 DEF this attack. Use this power only if Acolyte Body Armor is in your hand.

name: Alter Density
effect: If you control four or more face-down resources, target attacker or defender you control gets +2 DEF this attack.
"What good are your claws, Wolverine, when you can't even lift them?"

name: Amelia Voght, Acolyte
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Reservist
You may reveal two face-down reservist resources you control not named Amelia Voght rather than pay Amelia Voght's recruit cost.
"Humans will never accept us, Charles. We have to leave them behind."

name: Angel Dust, Adrenaline Junkie
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Angel Dust cannot have reinforcement.
Pay 1 resource point >>> Move Angel Dust to your hidden area.
After joining the Morlocks as a teenage runaway, Angel Dust found she couldn't return home without putting her parents in danger.

name: Angel of Mercy
effect:
Play Angel of Mercy only during the recovery phase.
You may discard a card. If you do, recover any number of stunned X-Men characters you control with combined cost 3 or less.
“When I discovered I could heal as well as destroy, I found a new purpose.”

name: Annalee, Mother Hen
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Concealed
Move Annalee from your hidden area to your visible area >>> Target attacker gets -3 DEF this attack while attacking a character with lesser cost.
"We'll live happily ever after, my sweetlings, like they do in your favorite storybooks."

name: Anne-Marie Cortez, Acolyte
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Reservist
At the start of the combat phase, you may reveal a resource. If you revealed a character card, your opponents cannot play plot twists with cost equal to that card's cost this phase.
Her powers are subtle, her devotion, absolute.

name: Ape, Metamorph
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Evasion
Discard an Energy card >>> Target opponent with 0 or less endurance loses the game.
"They call me Ape 'cause I can turn into anything I can think of . . . only I can't think of much!"

name: Archangel, Angel
effect:
Mutant — Physical
When Archangel comes into play, you may discard a card. If you do, search your deck for an X-Corp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"Listen, the only difference between me and you is I've fought for humans and mutants. What have you fought for?"

name: Army of One
effect: If you control exactly one visible character, target Hellfire Club attacker or defender you control gets +2 ATK / +2 DEF this attack.
"Prepare to be defeated, you Bolshevik buffoon."

name: Artie, Arthur Maddicks
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Evasion (Stun this character >>> Recover this character at the start of the recovery phase this turn.)
Whenever Artie becomes stunned, target character gets -1 ATK this turn.
His telepathic pictures can communicate in ways words just can't.

name: Avalanche, Freedom Force
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Discard a Physical card >>> Replace target face-up non–Team-Up resource. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Backs Against the Wall
effect:
Play Backs Against the Wall only if you control a Morlocks defender.
If two or more characters you control have become stunned this attack, remove all attackers from this attack.

name: Beast, Feline Geneticist
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Pay 0 endurance >>> Search your deck for an equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Use this power only once per turn and only during the recovery phase.
"Am I the only one disappointed in super villain banter these days? It just isn't what it used to be."

name: Beef, Hellion
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Reservist
At the start of the combat phase, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Physical card, put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on Beef.
Boost 2: Beef comes into play with five +1 ATK / +1 DEF counters on him.

name: Bevatron, Hellion
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Reservist
When Bevatron comes into play, discard any number of Energy cards. Put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on Bevatron for each card you discarded.
Remove a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter from Bevatron >>> Target opponent loses 2 endurance.

name: Bishop, XSE Commando
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Whenever Bishop becomes stunned, target opponent loses 3 endurance.
"There is a difference in dreaming a dream and winning a war."

name: Black Panther, King of Wakanda
effect:
Concealed—Optional
When Black Panther comes into play, search your deck for an equipment card with cost 1 or less, equip it to Black Panther, and shuffle your deck.
His heart is always with his people.

name: Blackbird Blue
effect:
Unique
X-Men characters you control get +2 ATK while attacking and have flight.
Mutant ingenuity and Shi'ar technology combine in this, the greatest transport the world has ever known.

name: Blob, Freedom Force
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Whenever an attacker you control causes 3 or more breakthrough while attacking a character, characters you control cannot be stunned while attacking this turn.
"An' what makes this caper a real hoot is the fact that we're the heroes and you clowns are the crooks!"

name: Bloodhound
effect:
As an additional cost to play Bloodhound, discard a Morlocks character card.
Search your deck for a character card with evasion, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"Come out, come out, wherever you are!"

name: Blow Hard, Windbag
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Whenever Blow Hard attacks a character, that character's controller moves all characters he controls to his support row.
"You corked ole Blow Hard's pipe, Marauder, but that ain't helpin' ya, not one jot!"

name: Blow the Man Down
effect:
Play Blow the Man Down only during your attack step and only if you control an Energy character.
Exhaust all unprotected visible characters target opponent controls.

name: Boot to the Head
effect:
As an additional cost to play Boot to the Head, replace a reservist Brotherhood resource you control.
Target attacker or defender gets -3 DEF this attack.

name: Brave New World, Team-Up
effect: As an additional cost to play Brave New World, choose two different team affiliations and a Mutant trait among characters you control.

name: Bum's Rush
effect: Target attacker you control gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF this attack and an additional +1 ATK / +1 DEF this attack for each stunned Morlocks character you control.

name: Caliban, Mutant Bloodhound
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Evasion (Stun this character >>> Recover this character at the start of the recovery phase this turn.)
Discard a Physical card >>> Characters you control can attack hidden characters this turn.
"Mutants near. Caliban feels them."

name: Callisto, Morlock Queen
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Evasion
Leader: Return a character adjacent to Callisto to its owner's hand >>> Put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on target character you control. Use this power only during the combat phase.
"We don't want to be heroes. We don't want to be villains. We just want to be left alone."

name: Cannonball, Blast Field
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Cannonball cannot be stunned while attacking.
In addition to allowing him to fly and move at high speeds, the field around Cannonball's body makes him impervious to physical harm.

name: Cardinal Law
effect: Target Hellfire Club attacker or defender you control gets +1 ATK this attack for each hidden character you control.
Obey and prosper. Disobey and suffer.

name: Catseye, Hellion
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Reservist
Whenever Catseye becomes stunned, you may KO her and have target Hellfire Club character you control get +2 ATK this turn.
Because she was raised by cats, Sharon Smith believes she is actually a feline who can take human form.

name: Changeling, Kevin Sidney
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Whenever Changeling becomes stunned, you may KO him and put a character card with cost 1 from your hand into your support row exhausted.
"I can be anyone you want. Just ask."

name: Chill Out!
effect:
Play Chill Out! only if you control an Energy character.
Whenever target visible character attacks this turn, it cannot ready during the recovery phase this turn.

name: Chrome, Acolyte
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Reservist
At the start of your attack step, you may exhaust target unprotected visible character if its cost is less than or equal to the number of face-down resources you control.
Only by turning Magneto's body to dense metal could Chrome save his mentor from Avalon's destruction.

name: Colossus, Acolyte
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Reservist
Colossus gets +3 ATK / +3 DEF while you control six or more face-down resources.
After a series of tragedies shattered his faith in Xavier's dream, Peter became a voice of reason on Avalon.

name: Colossus, Organic Steel
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Pay 0 endurance >>> Put three +1 ATK / +1 DEF counters on Colossus. Use this power only once per turn and only during the recovery phase.
"I believe in the Professor's dream, Katya, and I will fight for it until I die."

name: Courtney Ross, Once and Future Queen
effect:
Concealed
Characters get -1 ATK while attacking you directly.
She won her title from Emma Frost with a bluff and a gamble.

name: Crimson Commando, Freedom Force
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Whenever Crimson Commando causes 3 or more breakthrough while attacking a character, you may put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on each character you control.
His criminal exploits got him into trouble, then into Freedom Force.

name: Cybelle, Meltdown
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Concealed
Activate, move Cybelle from your hidden area to your visible area >>> Exhaust all characters with cost less than the cost of target attacker.
Cybelle and the other Tunnelers work to carve out a better home for the Morlocks.

name: Cyclops, Blue Leader
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Leader: Whenever a character adjacent to Cyclops attacks, target opponent loses 2 endurance.
"Like it or not, we're a superhero team, and it's about time we started acting like one."

name: Dark Phoenix, Alien Life Force
effect:
Loyalty
When Dark Phoenix comes into play, return all other characters you control to their owners' hands.
Whenever Dark Phoenix stuns a character, that character's controller loses endurance equal to its cost, and you gain that much endurance.

name: Dazzler, Rock Star
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Whenever a character you control team attacks, target opponent loses 1 endurance.
"I figured the life of a disco queen would be exciting—but this is ridiculous."

name: Deadly Game
effect: Move target hidden Hellfire Club character you control to your visible area. If you do, move a visible Hellfire Club character you control to your hidden area.

name: Destiny, Freedom Force
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Discard a Mental card >>> Target attacker or defender gets -3 DEF this attack. Use this power only once per turn.
Boost 1: When Destiny comes into play, draw two cards.
"We must act quickly, decisively, before the tide of battle turns irrevocably against us."

name: District X
effect: At the start of the combat phase, choose a Mutant trait. Characters you control, as well as cards in your hand, deck, and KO'd pile are Mutants and have the chosen trait this turn.
New York’s District X is home to many mutants, including the X-Man Bishop.

name: Doctor Druid, Anthony Druid
effect:
Reservist
Leader: Characters adjacent to Doctor Druid get +2 DEF while you control four or more face-down resources.
For a short while, he was the Avengers' chairman, guided by Ravonna's manipulative hand.

name: Doctor Sun, Creator of Project: Mind
effect: Pay 2 endurance, KO Doctor Sun >>> Remove all attackers from this attack. Use this power only if you control a defender with reinforcement.
Determined to create the ultimate thinking computer, Doctor Sun sacrificed his humanity and his sanity.

name: Donald Pierce, White Bishop
effect:
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)
Donald Pierce gets +2 ATK / +2 DEF while he is the only visible character you control.
Shaw saved his life, a favor Shaw made sure Pierce could never repay.

name: Drain Essence
effect:
As an additional cost to play Drain Essence, exhaust an Energy character you control.
KO target stunned character. Gain endurance equal to the cost of the character you exhausted.
"Youth is wasted on the young."

name: Electric Eve, Live Wire
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Evasion (Stun this character >>> Recover this character at the start of the recovery phase this turn.)
Whenever Electric Eve recovers, target opponent loses 1 endurance.
"Go up there and tell them what you are and see how long it takes before they tear you to pieces."

name: Eminent Domain
effect:
As an additional cost to play Eminent Domain, discard a Hellfire Club character card with concealed.
Choose a face-up non–Team-Up resource you control and one an opponent controls. Exchange the positions of those resources, then turn them face down.

name: Emma Frost, Friend or Foe
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Recruit Emma Frost only if you control a Mental character.
Discard a Mental card >>> Turn target face-up resource you control face down. Use this power only once per turn.
"Being an X-Man means a lot to me, but it doesn't always agree with me."

name: Emma Frost, White Queen
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Reservist, Concealed—Optional
Leader: Pay 1 endurance >>> Move a character adjacent to Emma Frost to your hidden or visible area. Use this power only during the combat phase.
Frost Industries made her a multi-millionaire, but the Hellfire Club made her a Queen.

name: Empath, Hellion
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Reservist (You may recruit this card from your resource row. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row.)
Whenever Empath becomes stunned, you may KO him and turn a face-up resource you control face down.

name: Enemy of My Enemy
effect:
As an additional cost to play Enemy of My Enemy, discard a character card.
Search your deck for an affiliated character card that does not share a printed affiliation with the card you discarded. Reveal that card, put it into your hand, and shuffle yo
"A most tempting offer, Shaw. I shall consider it."

name: Erg, Electric Eye
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Concealed
Activate, move Erg from your hidden area to your visible area >>> Target opponent exhausts a ready character he controls.
"Look into my eye. It's the last thing you'll ever see."

name: Evil Alliance, Team-Up
effect:
Play Evil Alliance only if you control a Hellfire Club character.
As an additional cost to play Evil Alliance, choose a team affiliation among characters you control.

name: Exodus, Acolyte
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Reservist
Leader: Whenever a character adjacent to Exodus attacks or defends, you may replace a resource with the same name as that adjacent character. If you do, that character has invulnerability this attack.
"I am the chosen successor of Magneto—master of a master race!"

name: Fabian Cortez, Acolyte
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Reservist
Leader: Whenever a character adjacent to Fabian Cortez causes breakthrough while attacking a character, that character's controller loses endurance equal to that character's cost.
Control of the Acolytes means more to Cortez than the lives of any of its members.

name: Feel the Burn
effect: Target attacker you control gets +2 ATK this attack. If that attacker is an Energy character, each of your opponents loses 3 endurance.
"I must be going. You'll forgive me if I kill you before I leave?"

name: Feral, Maria Callasantos
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Feral cannot have reinforcement.
Pay 1 resource point >>> Move Feral to your hidden area. Feral cannot be stunned while attacking this turn.
“I’ll take the seven on the right.”

name: Firestar, Hellion
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Reservist (You may recruit this card from your resource row. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row.)
Whenever Firestar becomes stunned, you may KO her and have target opponent lose 5 endurance.

name: Franklin Richards, Trapped in Time
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Cosmic: Franklin Richards gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF for each equipped character you control.
Rachel Summers was his one true love, and not even time itself could keep him from her.

name: Freedom Force
effect: Power-up target Brotherhood attacker or defender you control.
Yet another of the government's well-planned ideas.

name: Friedrich Von Roehm, Black Rook
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Concealed—Optional (You may have this character come into play in the hidden area.)
Friedrich Von Roehm gets +3 ATK while he is visible and you have the initiative.
He was born and bred to be Selene's loyal servant, and only she can awaken the beast within.

name: Gambit, Ragin' Cajun
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Discard an Energy card >>> Stun target character with cost 3 or less. Use this power only once per turn and only during your attack step.
"M'sweet, I never gamble . . . I win. At everything."

name: Gargantua, Edward Cobert
effect: Pay 1 resource point >>> Put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on Gargantua. Use this power only once per turn.
Servant of the Lord of Stones, it is a mindless, heartless force of nature.

name: Genis-Vell as Photon, Transformed
effect:
Reservist
Discard Genis-Vell >>> Target character you control with cost 3 or less gets +2 DEF this attack. Use this power only if Genis-Vell is in your hand.
Lying dormant under the waves, the man known as Captain Marvel would soon take on a different mantle.

name: Go Down Fighting
effect:
Target character you control gets +1 ATK this attack.
Reveal Go Down Fighting from your hand or resource row >>> Whenever a Brotherhood character you control becomes stunned this turn, you may KO a resource you control. If you do, put that character c

name: Good Samaritan
effect:
As an additional cost to play Good Samaritan, KO a Morlocks character you control.
Recover target stunned character you control. While that character is defending this turn, if a character would cause breakthrough, instead, that character causes 3 les
"Don't worry about me. Like your anguish, mine will pass."

name: Harry Delgado, Acolyte
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Reservist
Replace a reservist resource you control >>> Target non-defending character loses reinforcement and cannot have reinforcement this turn. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Harry Leland, Black Bishop
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Concealed—Optional
Discard a Mental card >>> Target defender you control gets -2 ATK / +2 DEF and has reinforcement this attack. Use this power only if Harry Leland is visible.
"Your challenge is accepted, dear boy. Stop you I shall."

name: Harry's Hideaway
effect: Discard a card, replace Harry's Hideaway >>> Choose one: Recover target stunned character you control with cost 2 or less; or recover target stunned X-Men character you control with cost 4 or less. Use this power only during the recovery phase.
"I wish all my problems could still be solved with a banana split."

name: Havok, Critical Mass
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Stun Havok >>> Stun target character with cost 5 or less. Use this power only during the recovery phase.
"Stand back. This is going to hurt someone, and I'd prefer it wasn't you."

name: Healer, Life Giver
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Evasion
Whenever another character you control recovers, gain 1 endurance.
Pay 1 resource point >>> At the start of the recovery phase this turn, recover target character you control. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Hellfire Club Initiate, Army
effect:
Concealed
You may discard a non-Army Hellfire Club character card rather than pay Hellfire Club Initiate's recruit cost. If you do, Hellfire Club Initiate comes into play exhausted.
Few of them know what they're really getting into.

name: Hellfire Club Mercenary, Army
effect: You may discard a non-Army Hellfire Club character card rather than pay Hellfire Club Mercenary's recruit cost. If you do, Hellfire Club Mercenary comes into play exhausted.
Pawns are meant to be sacrificed.

name: Hellhound
effect: Brotherhood characters you control get +4 ATK while attacking characters with lesser cost this turn.

name: Hemingway, Gene Nation
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Hemingway cannot have reinforcement.
Mikhail Rasputin raised the few Morlocks who escaped the destruction of the sewers to become Gene Nation, his personal terrorist army.

name: Henrietta Hunter, X-Celebrity
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Leader: KO a non-Army character adjacent to Henrietta Hunter >>> Draw a card. Use this power only during the combat phase.
Any resemblance to an actual person, living or dead, is completely intentional.

name: Homo Superior
effect: Target Mutant attacker you control gets +2 ATK this attack and an additional +2 ATK this attack if a non-Mutant character is defending.
"Homo Sapiens destroyed their predecessors. It has come full circle. Now, it's their turn."

name: Hump, Servant of Masque
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Evasion
As an additional cost to recruit Hump, discard a Physical card.
While you control exactly one non-stunned character, Hump gets +2 ATK / +2 DEF.

name: Iceman, Deep Freeze
effect:
Mutant — Energy
As an additional cost to recruit Iceman, discard an Energy card.
Whenever a character attacks Iceman or defends against him, that character cannot ready this turn.

name: Image Inducer
effect:
Transferable (At the start of your formation step, you may transfer this equipment to a character you control.)
Equipped character has the team affiliations of each character you control.
Equipped character gets +1 ATK and an additional +1 ATK if

name: Immovable
effect: Discard any number of Physical cards. Target defender you control gets +1 DEF this attack and gets an additional +1 DEF this attack for each card you discarded.

name: Inner Circle
effect: Hidden Hellfire Club characters you control get +1 ATK / +1 DEF while you control three or more hidden characters.
A secret society dedicated to the acquisition of power in all its myriad forms.

name: James Proudstar as Thunderbird, Hellion
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Reservist
Whenever James Proudstar becomes stunned, return each stunned character to its owner's hand.
"Xavier killed my brother. He has to pay."

name: Jean Grey, Red
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Discard a Mental card >>> Replace any number of face-up resources you control. Use this power only once per turn.
"You're talking to the woman who's been killed, cloned, and kidnapped more times than even I can remember."

name: Jetstream, Hellion
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Reservist
Characters you control have flight.
Whenever Jetstream becomes stunned, you may KO him and exhaust target character with cost 6 or less.

name: Joanna Cargill, Acolyte
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Reservist (You may recruit this card from your resource row. If you do, you may put a card from your hand face down into your resource row.)
Joanna Cargill gets -1 ATK / -1 DEF for each face-up resource you control.
Once a vicious thug, she became Magneto's envoy to the flatscans.

name: Join the Club!
effect:
As an additional cost to play Join the Club!, discard a Hellfire Club character card.
Search your deck for a character card with concealed, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"Forgive the caution, but we are very . . . selective about our membership."

name: Jubilee, Jubilation Lee
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Pay 0 endurance >>> Target opponent loses 2 endurance. Use this power only once per turn and only during the recovery phase.
"Why does everyone say my name like it means 'shut up'?"

name: Juggernaut, The Unstoppable
effect: Whenever Juggernaut stuns a front row defender, you may stun target support row character in the same column as that defender.
After years under Cyttorak's control, Cain Marko is now free to choose his own path.

name: Julia Carpenter, Freedom Force
effect:
Evasion
Whenever Julia Carpenter causes 3 or more breakthrough while attacking a character, target character cannot ready this turn.
"Typical! You put the crooks on the payroll—and you lock up the heroes!"

name: Kang, Scarlet Centurion
effect:
Concealed
Kang is not unique.
Activate, move Kang from your hidden area to your visible area >>> Negate target effect from a non-ongoing plot twist.
"You need something from me. Groveling wouldn't hurt."

name: Kidney Punch
effect: Target attacker you control gets +2 ATK this attack. If that attacker is a Physical character, it gets an additional +2 DEF this attack.

name: Kill or be Killed
effect: Target Physical attacker or defender you control gets +3 ATK this turn.
"Tell the Hand they're gonna need more ninjas."

name: Kill the Flatscans
effect: Whenever target Brotherhood attacker you control causes 3 or more breakthrough while attacking a character this attack, KO that character.
"Think not of their suffering. Think of the suffering they've inflicted on us."

name: Kleinstock Brothers, Acolyte
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Reservist
Reveal a face-down resource named Kleinstock Brothers >>> Kleinstock Brothers gets +2 ATK this attack. Use this power only once per turn.
When the Kleinstocks fuse together, they fight with a single mind.

name: Krakoa, Island Monster
effect:
Mutant — Mental
When Krakoa comes into play, you may KO a resource you control. If you do, search your deck for a location card, reveal it, put it face down into your resource row, and shuffle your deck.
"The mutant isn't ON the island . . . the mutant IS the island!"

name: Kristoff Von Doom, Pretender to the Throne
effect:
You are considered to control Dr. Doom.
Your opponents cannot play non–Team-Up plot twists with the same name as a face-up resource.
"I am the true Doctor Doom! All pretenders will perish under my heel!"

name: Lady Lark, Skylark
effect:
Reservist
Whenever Lady Lark becomes stunned, if you have no cards in hand, you may recover her at the start of the recovery phase this turn.
She returned to the Squadron with more than just a sonic scream.

name: Leadership Challenge
effect: Target leader attacker you control gets +2 ATK / +2 DEF this attack and an additional +1 ATK / +1 DEF this attack if a leader is defending.
"Callisto, I lead the X-Men. The challenge, the duel—your life—are mine!"

name: Leech, Inhibitor
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Evasion
Whenever Leech becomes stunned, you may discard a card. If you do, negate target character payment power.
He can flick anyone's switch to "off."

name: Lockheed, Saurian Sidekick
effect: Discard an Energy card >>> Lockheed gets +2 ATK this attack.
If you called him Kitty's sidekick, he'd probably laugh . . . then set you on fire.

name: Longshot, Hero of Mojoworld
effect:
Reservist
Pay 0 endurance >>> Look at the top four cards of your deck. Put two of those cards on the bottom of your deck and the rest on the top of your deck in any order. Use this power only once per turn and only during the recovery phase.
The worse the odds, the better he gets.

name: Lying in Wait
effect: Brotherhood characters you control get +3 ATK while defending this turn.

name: Madelyne Pryor, Black Rook
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Concealed—Optional
KO a Hellfire Club character you control >>> Characters you control have flight and range this turn. Characters your opponents control get -2 DEF while defending this turn. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Magnetic Force
effect: You may exhaust an Energy character you control. If you do, exhaust target character if its cost is less than the cost of the character you exhausted.
"I have lost my patience with your students, Charles. It is time for them to die . . . and for you to watch."

name: Magneto, Black Lord
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Concealed—Optional
Stun a character you control >>> Stun target character if its cost is less than the cost of the character you stunned. Use this power only once per turn and only if Magneto is your only visible character.

name: Magneto, Ruler of Avalon
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Reservist
Leader: Whenever a character adjacent to Magneto stuns a character, target opponent loses 1 endurance for each face-down resource you control.
"Enough suffering, enough pain. It all stops now . . . with me."

name: Man-Bull, William Taurens
effect:
Exhaust a character you control >>> Man-Bull gets +1 ATK this turn.
Exhausted characters you control cannot be stunned by or targeted by effects from non-ongoing plot twists your opponents control.
"Mooooooo!"

name: Marrow, Gene Nation
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Evasion (Stun this character >>> Recover this character at the start of the recovery phase this turn.)
Marrow gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF for each stunned character you control.
"We don't have pretty powers like Xavier's kids, but what we've got keeps us alive."

name: Masque, Flesh Shaper
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Leader: Whenever a character adjacent to Masque becomes stunned during the combat phase, you may KO that adjacent character. If you do, put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on each other character adjacent to Masque.
"You think you're better'n me, 'cause you're pretty?! I can fix that—for good!"

name: Massachusetts Academy
effect: Activate, KO a Hellfire Club character you control >>> Draw a card. You may put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on a character you control.
Few outsiders suspect Emma Frost of using this prestigious New England prep school as a training ground for the Hellions.

name: Mastermind, Dark Dreamer
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Concealed—Optional
Whenever Mastermind becomes stunned while visible, you may move him to your hidden area. If you do, you may move a different hidden character you control to your visible area.

name: Mech Bay
effect:
Whenever a ready Thunderbolts defender you control stuns an attacker, that attacker cannot ready this turn.
Activate >>> Target character you control gets +2 ATK this attack. Target opponent may draw a card.
All the tools you need to protect the world . . . or conquer it.

name: Memory Probe
effect:
As an additional cost to play Memory Probe, exhaust a Mental character you control.
Look at the top X cards of your deck, where X is the cost of the character you exhausted. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck

name: Mental Domination
effect:
Play Mental Domination only if you control a Mental defender.
Choose one: Target attacker gets -3 DEF this attack; or negate target effect from a non-ongoing plot twist.
"Speed and strength are nothing without willpower, Pietro. Let me prove it to you."

name: Mikhail Rasputin, Morlock Messiah
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Leader: Whenever a character adjacent to Mikhail Rasputin becomes stunned during the combat phase, target player exhausts a ready character he controls.
After being driven mad by memories of his dead companions, Rasputin flooded the Morlock tunnels and took the survivors through a dimensional rift to the Hill.

name: Mind Control
effect:
Play Mind Control only if you control a Mental character.
Target character cannot cause breakthrough while attacking a character this turn.
"What does it matter if it is real or a dream? It is what you desire."

name: Mindtap Mechanism
effect:
Concealed—Optional
Equipped character gets +3 ATK.
At the start of the recovery phase, put a +1 ATK / +1 DEF counter on equipped character.

name: Mob Mentality
effect: Target character you control gets +3 ATK while attacking this turn.

name: Momentary Distraction
effect:
As an additional cost to play Momentary Distraction, exhaust a Physical defender you control.
Target defender cannot be stunned this attack while its cost is greater than the combined cost of all attackers.

name: Morlock Justice
effect:
Play Morlock Justice only if you control a Morlocks character.
Target character loses reinforcement and cannot have reinforcement this turn. That character's controller loses 1 endurance for each stunned character you control.
"If we don't make our own justice, nobody will do it for us."

name: Multiple Man as Jamie Madrox, Army
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Multiple Man has the team affiliations of each other character you control.
Whenever Multiple Man becomes stunned, you may remove him from the game. If you do, you may put up to two character cards named Multiple Man from your hand into your front row

name: Mutant Massacre
effect:
As an additional cost to play Mutant Massacre, exhaust a Mutant you control.
Remove target stunned character from the game.

name: Mutopia, Team-Up
effect:
As an additional cost to play Mutopia, choose two or more different team affiliations among characters you control that share the same Mutant trait.
Draw a card.
Xavier's dream, drawn by Magneto's hand.

name: Mysterium, Joseph Lightner
effect:
Reservist
If Mysterium would cause breakthrough while attacking a character, instead, that character's controller loses the game.
As the Nth Man, Lightner menaced an entire universe. As Mysterium, he works to redeem himself.

name: Mystique, Freedom Force
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Leader: Characters adjacent to Mystique get +3 ATK.
"Don't get me wrong—I'm in this for me."

name: Neutralized
effect:
As an additional cost to play Neutralized, exhaust a Morlocks character you control.
Choose a stunned character.

name: Nightcrawler, Swashbuckler
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Discard a card >>> The controller of target character moves it to a different position. Use this power only once per turn.
"How I do my job is my business, and I choose to do it with a little style and a lot of fun.”

name: Pack Tactics
effect:
Target character has flight and range this turn and gets +2 ATK while defending this turn.
Pack Tactics has the Physical trait in your hand, deck, and KO'd pile.
In a brawl, there's always room for one more.

name: Phase Shift
effect:
Target character has flight and range and gets +1 ATK this turn.
Phase Shift has the Energy trait in your hand, deck, and KO'd pile.
"I disrupt any electrical system I phase through. It's a handy side-effect."

name: Phoenix Rising
effect:
As an additional cost to play Phoenix Rising, remove a character card in your KO'd pile from the game.
Recover target stunned X-Men character you control if its name is the same as that of the card you removed.
From this moment, nothing would ever be the same.

name: Piper, Rat Charmer
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Concealed
Move Piper from your hidden area to your visible area >>> Move target stunned character with cost 5 or less to your support row. Use this power only once per turn.
When you're a bottom feeder, you need all the friends you can get. Sometimes, that means rats.

name: Plague, Deathwalker
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Plague cannot have reinforcement.
Pay 1 resource point >>> Move Plague to your hidden area.
She is a living, breathing epidemic.

name: Planet X, Team-Up
effect:
Play Planet X only if you control a Brotherhood character.
As an additional cost to play Planet X, choose a team affiliation among characters you control.

name: Polaris, Acolyte
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Reservist
Replace a reservist resource you control >>> Characters you control have flight this turn, and characters your opponents control lose flight this turn. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Postman, Memory Thief
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Evasion
Whenever Postman becomes stunned, you may KO him and replace target non–Team-Up ongoing plot twist.
He can make anyone else forget anything, but he will never forget his own loss.

name: Power and Wealth
effect:
As an additional cost to play Power and Wealth, exhaust two Hellfire Club characters you control.
Search your deck for a location or plot twist card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
"Humanity is funding its own demise. How marvelous."

name: Power Play
effect:
Play Power Play only if you control three or more hidden Hellfire Club characters.
At the start of the next phase, gain control of the initiative.
You cannot play plot twists this game.

name: Professor X, Headmaster
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Pay 0 endurance >>> Draw a card. Use this power only once per turn and only during the recovery phase.
Leader: Characters adjacent to Professor X have the X-Men affiliation.
"We need a plan that brings humans and mutants together and doesn't drive them apart."

name: Psi-Link
effect:
Play Psi-Link only if you control a Mental character.
As an additional cost to play Psi-Link, choose a Mutant trait.

name: Psionic Storm
effect: Target attacker you control gets +2 ATK this attack. If that attacker is a Mental character, it has invulnerability this attack.
Pure will is the final measure of a mental contest.

name: Psychic Armor
effect:
Target character has flight and range this turn and gets +2 DEF while attacking this turn.
Psychic Armor has the Mental trait in your hand, deck, and KO'd pile.

name: Psychic Struggle
effect:
Play Psychic Struggle only if you control a Mental character.
Negate target plot twist or location effect targeting a character you control.
"I understand you call yourself something of a telepath. Well, 'your majesty,' let's see how good you really are."

name: Psylocke, Armored Empath
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Discard a Mental card >>> Negate target effect from a non-ongoing plot twist. Use this power only once per turn and only if a Mental character you control is attacking or defending.
“The old costume was pretty, but watching Peter in action really made me think about re-designing it.”

name: Pyro, Freedom Force
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Whenever Pyro causes 3 or more breakthrough while attacking a character, target opponent loses 3 endurance.
"Just a bunch of bloody fools playing a bloody fool's game."

name: Rachel Summers as Phoenix, Phoenix of the Future
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Reservist
Your opponents cannot play plot twists while you control another Mental character.
A daughter Jean will never have, from a future that can never be.

name: Raising Hell
effect: You may KO a Hellfire Club character you control. If you do, KO target stunned character with cost 4 or less.
"Terribly sorry, but our vision of the world doesn't include you."

name: Rebirth
effect:
As an additional cost to play Rebirth, exhaust an X-Men character you control.
Recover each stunned character adjacent to the character you exhausted with cost less than or equal to that character's cost.
Alpha hoped that by turning Magneto into an infant, he could make him a new man.

name: Rem-Ram, Acolyte
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Reservist
When you recruit Rem-Ram, reveal the top four cards of your deck. You may put one revealed reservist card into your hand. Put the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck.
Dreams show him everything—desires, ambitions, and fears.

name: Retribution
effect: Target Morlocks character you control gets +2 ATK this attack and an additional +1 ATK this attack for each stunned character you control.
“You never learned to leave us be, so now, you’re going to learn the hard way.”

name: Roberto Da Costa, Heir to the Throne
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Concealed—Optional

name: Rogue, Anna Marie

Mutant — Energy

name: Roulette, Hellion

effect: Activate, replace a reservist resource you control >>> Target Brotherhood attacker you control gets +3 ATK this attack.

name: Sabretooth, Savage Killer

Reservist

name: Sage, Tessa

Mutant — Mental

name: Sage, Xavier's Secret Weapon
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Plot twists cost your opponents 2 more to play.
Locations cost your opponents 2 more to flip.

name: Scaleface, Dragon Lady
effect:
Mutant — Physical

Whenever Scaleface attacks, if you control two or more stunned characters, defenders lose reinforcement and cannot have reinforcement this attack.
If you see this side of her, you've done something wrong.

name: Scanner, Acolyte
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Reservist, Concealed—Optional
Replace a reservist resource you control >>> Look at the top four cards of your deck and put them on the top of your deck in any order. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Sebastian Shaw, Black King
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Concealed—Optional
Leader: KO two hidden Hellfire Club characters adjacent to Sebastian Shaw >>> Ready Sebastian Shaw. Use this power only once per turn and only during the combat phase.
"If you desire my position, all you have to do is take it from my cold, dead hands."

name: Selene, Black Queen
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Concealed
Whenever Selene stuns a defender, gain endurance equal to that character's cost.
The immortal Selene was content ruling Nova Roma until she learned the Hellfire Club could give her the world.

name: Sentinel Mark VI, Army
effect: Sentinel Mark VI gets +2 ATK / +2 DEF while attacking a Mutant or defending against a Mutant.

name: Senyaka, Acolyte
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Reservist

name: Sewer System
effect:
Activate >>> Target character you control can attack hidden characters and protected characters this turn.
Activate >>> Move target Morlocks character with concealed you control to your hidden area.

name: Shadowcat, Katya
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Discard a card >>> Move Shadowcat to your hidden or visible area. Use this power only once per turn.
"I've been an X-Man since I was fourteen, Pete. It's like wearing a big sign saying 'Please try and kill me, I like it.'"

name: Shake, Rattle, and Roll
effect:

As an additional cost to play Shake, Rattle, and Roll, replace a face-up resource you control.

name: Shaw Industries
effect: While you control exactly one visible character, that character gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF. While you control two or more hidden Hellfire Club characters, that character gets an additional +1 ATK / +1 DEF.
"Mutant powers pale in comparison to the power of money."

name: Shinobi Shaw, White King
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Concealed—Optional

name: Shrapnel Blast
effect: Target Morlocks attacker or defender you control gets +4 ATK / +4 DEF this attack if you control three or more stunned characters.
"I like to share my pain with others."

name: Silver Sabre, Freedom Force
effect:
Mutant — Physical

effect:

name: Special Delivery
effect: Target Physical attacker you control cannot be stunned this attack.

name: Spoor, Acolyte
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Reservist

name: Stonewall, Freedom Force

Mutant — Physical

name: Storm, Gold Leader
effect:
Mutant — Energy

name: Storm, Leader of the Morlocks
effect:
Reservist, Evasion

name: Sub-Mariner, Namor
effect:
Reservist

name: Subterranean Sanctuary
effect: Whenever a character with cost 3 or greater attacks you directly, gain endurance equal to the number of stunned Morlocks characters you control.

name: Sunder, Callisto's Enforcer
effect:
Mutant — Physical

effect: Target attacker or defender you control with two or more team affiliations gets +2 DEF this attack.

name: Tar Baby, Adhesive Ally

Mutant — Physical
Evasion (Stun this character >>> Recover this character at the start of the recovery phase this turn.)

name: Tarot, Hellion
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Reservist

name: Teamwork
effect: You may discard a card. If you do, search your deck for a Team-Up card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: The Acolytes
effect:

Mutant — Mental
Evasion

name: The Forsaken, Team-Up

name: The Hellfire Club
effect:

name: The Hill

name: Thornn, Lucia Callasantos

Evasion

name: Tommy, Runaway
effect:
Mutant — Physical
Evasion (Stun this character >>> Recover this character at the start of the recovery phase this turn.)

name: Toxin, Patrick Mulligan
effect:
Evasion

name: Trevor Fitzroy, White Rook
effect:
Mutant — Energy
Concealed—Optional

name: Turnabout

name: Unuscione, Acolyte
effect:
Mutant — Mental
Reservist

name: Viper, White Warrior Princess

name: Witch Woman, Linda Littletrees

name: Wolverine, Patch
effect:
Mutant — Physical

name: Wolverine, The Best at What He Does

Mutant — Physical

name: Worthington Industries, X-Corp

name: Wundagore Citadel

name: X-Corp: Paris, X-Corp
effect: Activate >>> Look at the top X cards of your deck, where X is the number of X-Corp locations you control. Put any number of those cards on the bottom of your deck and the rest on the top of your deck in any order.
